name: Contact: Last Defence
description:
You are commander of the asteroid defence ship SABRE. While protecting the planet from impact events, first contact with an aggressive alien species throws you into the role of the planets Last Defence.

  • Mission based campaign
  • 3 Difficulty modes from casual to hard core
  • Arcade mode with online leaderboard
  • Earn upgrades to change and balance your ships loadout
  • Warp freely around the playfield to gain a positional advantage
  • Unlock steam achievements
  • Exclusively Created For VR
